author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEBBY A LITTLE STRONGER... ...MAJOR FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES FOR PORTIONS OF THE CAROLINAS...
summary:
...DEBBY A LITTLE STRONGER... ...MAJOR FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES FOR PORTIONS OF THE CAROLINAS...
 As of 2:00 AM EDT Wed Aug 7
 the center of Debby was located near 31.8, -79.8
 with movement ESE at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 996 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
